burgers.name: The Hannibal Lecter
burgers.description: Named after one of the most iconic characters in literature, the Hannibal Lecter is absolutely 'de-lecter-ble'. Human patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, bacon, and optional cheese.

burgers.name: The Jeffrey Dahmer
burgers.description: Inspired by the 'Milwaukee Cannibal' Jeffrey Dahmer, this burger is loaded with the finest Wisconsin cheese. Human patty topped with Wisconsin cheddar, lettuce, and tomato.

burgers.name: The Albert Fish
burgers.description: A burger made of fresh, farm raised children. A regular human patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and optional cheese. See the 'Kiddie Burger' for a child sized portion.

burgers.name: The Red Dragon
burgers.description: The Red Dragon is a 1/2lb burger that is only served rare and bloody. We are not responsible for any cases of food poisoning. Order at your own risk. Human patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and optional cheese.

burgers.name: The Kiddie Burger
burgers.description: An option for our younger guests, the Kiddie Burger is made from fresh, farm raised children. Human patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and optional cheese.

sides.name: The Vlad
sides.description: Savory chunks of grilled human meat brushed with teriyaki sauce on a skewer.

sides.name: Brain Soup
sides.description: Noodle soup with pork broth and human brains.

sides.name: "Chicken" Fingers
sides.description: Deep fried human fingers, comes with a side of barbeque sauce.

sides.name: Silence of the Lamb Chops
sides.description: Named after the famous novel by Thomas Harris, these lamb chops aren't actually lamb, but human. These human chops are grilled with a brown sugar glaze and garnished with fresh parsley.

sides.name: Loaded Skins
sides.description: Fried human skins covered in cheese, sour cream, green onions, and bacon.

desserts.name: The Sweeney Todd
desserts.description: A meat pie filled with minced meats and a range of fruits.

desserts.name: Lover's Dumplings
desserts.description: Sweet dumplings made using shortening made from human fat.

desserts.name: Eye Pops
desserts.description: Like a cake pop, but just a sugared eyeball.

desserts.name: Tongue Pops
desserts.description: Like a popsicle, but just someone's tongue frozen and soaked in sugar water. Try not to think about it.

desserts.name: Actual Human Feces
desserts.description: Exactly what it says it is. Comes in a dish or a cone.
